name: Food Delivery Application
description:
Food Cart delivery app iOS UI kit consisting of 20+ pre-made but fully customizable screens. ood ordering & delivery app UI kit designed for Restaurants and food delivery shops and vendors. File includes all recent features such as Symbols or Components, Overrides, Resize Options, Text, and Layer Styles.


If you need to modify the theme you can easily change the colors and change the single elements. Only vector shapes and layer styles were used.


You can easily make this kit your own by simply modifying the text and color styles and adding your own content.


Fonts are included.


It has an easy setup and many features that are required in the restaurant business.


Key Features


20 iOS screens for FIGMA

375x812px Resolution

100% scalable Vectors

Totally based on Flat Design Standards

Symbol Objects

Fully Layered & Organized

Easy to change color style

Hope you guys like it.
